name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior HubSpot Engineer with 9+ years of experience in API integrations and CRM solutions. Proficient in designing and implementing **HubSpot** workflows, **custom objects**, and automation processes that enhance customer engagement and streamline operational efficiencies. Skilled in REST APIs, **Zapier**, and **Workato** for seamless data connections. Additionally, possess a strong foundation in frontend technologies, including **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**, along with backend proficiency in SQL. Leverage my expertise to lead projects and collaborate effectively across diverse teams, ensuring successful delivery of innovative solutions.

experience.responsibilities:
Designed and developed custom CRM solutions using **HubSpot** to optimize workflow design and automation, leading to a 25% increase in user satisfaction.
Built and integrated **REST APIs** for seamless interaction between **HubSpot** and external systems, enhancing data accessibility and operational efficiency.
Developed custom objects in **HubSpot** to improve data structure and support specific business requirements.
Implemented automated workflows within **HubSpot**, resulting in a 30% reduction in manual processes.
Utilized **Zapier** and **Workato** for efficient data integration and task automation, enhancing overall productivity by 20%.
Created dynamic and responsive interfaces using **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**, leading to an improved user experience across devices.
Executed SQL queries to retrieve and manipulate data within **HubSpot**, optimizing performance and supporting reporting needs.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance the functionality of the **HubSpot** platform, fostering efficient project delivery.
Stabilized and secured application integrations by implementing robust API authentication protocols.
Ensured compliance with CRM best practices through rigorous testing and user feedback integration.

Developed and implemented **REST APIs** within **HubSpot** to enhance CRM functionalities and automation processes, significantly improving workflow efficiency by 20%.
Established custom objects within **HubSpot** to tailor the CRM experience, ensuring alignment with customer requirements and business goals.
Designed workflow automation using **Zapier** and **Workato**, resulting in a **30%** reduction in manual tasks and streamlining operations.
Created engaging user interfaces using **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**, increasing user satisfaction scores by **15%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather and define system requirements, adhering to project timelines for successful project delivery.
Optimized SQL queries for performance improvement, leading to faster data retrieval and enhanced reporting capabilities.
Conducted training sessions on **HubSpot**features for team members, fostering a knowledge-sharing culture within the organization.
Utilized **HubL** for dynamic content creation, enhancing the customization capabilities of the platform.
Led code reviews and provided mentorship to junior developers, contributing to a **25%** increase in team productivity.

Utilized **HubSpot** to design and implement custom objects, enhancing CRM functionality and enabling tailored solutions for clients.
Leveraged **REST APIs** to facilitate data integration between HubSpot and external systems, improving workflow automation by 25%.
Developed custom workflows using **Zapier** and **Workato** to streamline operational processes, reducing manual tasks and increasing efficiency.
Crafted visually appealing user interfaces with **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript** for enhanced user engagement and experience.
Integrated third-party APIs to enrich HubSpot data, enabling smarter marketing strategies and improved analytics.
Managed data with **SQL** to ensure accurate reporting and seamless access to customer insights, reducing data retrieval time by 30%.
Participated in the design of automation strategies within HubSpot, aligning marketing and sales processes for better lead management.
Contributed to the development of technical documentation, leading to a 15% decrease in onboarding time for new team members.
Collaborated in cross-functional teams for daily standups and code reviews, ensuring project goals were met consistently.
